DESCRIPCION APP: Evaluation of forest fire risk and fire extinction difficulty.
bienvenida_creditos: Welcome to "ECONOSINAMI version 2.0" tool.  This app form part of modular structure of SINAMI model, developed for the economic evaluation of wildfires defense programs.
descripcion_creditos: ECONOSINAMI is present as a tool for a comparative study of options for planning strategies,  based on marginal analysis techniques like defense programmes, natural resources valoration, the performance of extinguishing media, the historical background of forest fires in the study area and characterization of fire behavior.
direccion_proyecto_creditos: The development of EconoSINAMI tool has been leadered by Professor Dr. Fco. Rodríguez and Silva and researcher Dr. Juan Ramón Molina Martinez, from Forest Fire Laboratory of Forest Engineering Department,  University of Córdoba, Spain. The computer program has been developed by Antonio Vida, Software Engineer.
Este programa ha sido desarrollado en el: Developed in the financial framework of Interreg-Poctep project:
Fortalecimiento de los sistemas transfro: Strengthening cross-border systems for preventing and extinguishing forest fires and improving resources for rural employment creation post-Covid-19  (FIREPOCTEP)
Centro Ibérico para la Investigación y L: Iberian Centre for Research and Forest Firefighting (CILIFO)
